Literature.Title: Design of novel analogues with potent antibiotic activity based on the antimicrobial peptide, HP(2-9)-ME(1-12).
Literature.Author: Park Y, Kim HN, Park SN, Jang SH, Choi CH, Lim HT, Hahm KS

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus subtilis KCTC 1918(MIC=0.78µM),Staphylococcus aureus KCTC 1621(MIC=1.56µM),Proteus vulgaris KCTC 2433(MIC=0.39µM),Salmonella typhimurium KCTC 1926(MIC=0.19µM),Saccharomyces cerevisiae KCTC 7296(MIC=6.25µM),Trichosporon beigelii KCTC 7707(MIC=3.125-6.25µM),Candida albicans TIMM 1768(MIC=6.25µM)
